roleset.name: understand, comprehending
roleset.note: UNDERSTAND-V NOTES: Frames file for 'understand' based on sentences in financial subcorpus, adjectival 'understanding' based on BOLT-4,5. Member of Vncls approve-77, comprehend-87.2-1. (from understand.01-v)
UNDERSTANDING-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from understanding.01-j)

example.name: grok
example.text: Program trading is here to stay, and computers are here to stay, and [we]-1 just need *trace*-1 to understand it.''

example.name: split thing understood
example.text: But [Mr. Corr]-1 , a stunt pilot in his spare time , was understood [*-1]to be frustrated [*-2] by what he regarded [*T*-3] as limited freedom under Mr. Lorenzo .
example.arg: [[*-1] to be frustrated [*-2]by what he regarded [*T*-3] as limited freedom under Mr. Lorenzo]

example.name: it support
example.text: It's understood that MGM/UA recently contacted Rupert Murdoch's News Corp., which made two failed bids for the movie studio, to see if the company was still interested.
example.arg: that MGM/UA recently contacted Rupert Murdoch's News Corp., which made two failed bids for the movie studio, to see if the company was still interested

example.name: with attribute and apparently missing arg0
example.text: The three most important things [0] [*]-1 to understand [*T*-1] about Mr. Allen is that he is a black conservative intellectual -- a triple threat to the liberal establishment .

example.name: adjectival rel: understanding
example.text: You definitely are n't crazy though do n't worry and your GP will be understanding of the issue I 'm sure .

example.name: Arg0,1
example.text: A researcher uses his understanding of the human brain to advance on a popular quiz show in Estonia.

roleset.name: capable of being understood
roleset.note: UNDERSTANDABLE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1, related to understand.01. (from understandable.01-j)

role.descr: understood as; secondary predication on arg1

example.name: arg1
example.text: Obviously if you 're Scottish and support the union that 's understandable , because hell I would because you 're getting masses of benefits whilst giving little in return .
example.arg: if you're Scottish and support the union
beacuse hell I would because you 're getting masses of benefits whilst giving little in return
